title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 651.9 - Destruction of records
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 651.9 - Destruction of records

State Regulations

The destruction of the records permitted to be destroyed
under the provisions of the regulations in this Part may be performed in any
manner elected by the carrier concerned. Precautions shall be taken, however, to macerate, or otherwise destroy the legibility of, records the content of
which is forbidden by law to be divulged to unauthorized
persons. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16
ยง
651.9

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
